About Me

  • About

    I am a front-end web developer who is passionate about problem solving, visual design and programming. I am able to rapidly learn new technologies and believe that my attention to detail in code and visual design will add value to any team. I look forward to working in and contributing to talented teams and also learning from amazing programmers.

  • Education

    I have acquired my development skills through independent learning using a self-curated curriculum of paid online courses on sites like Udemy, while supplementing it with free YouTube courses from proven web development content creators. I applied those skills to personal projects to cement the knowledge acquired and believe in continuous professional development in order to stay relevant.
